storyInfo: After a skirmish, Horn and company are rescued by Misery. Manfred turns his offensive on Mandragora.

attributes.content: It's so strange, Doctor. We definitely shook off the Sarkaz warriors from before...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Closure, are our communications being traced?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not a chance, Amiya, I guarantee it! I set up triple-layer encryption on our transmitters! If they had the tech for that, then Theresis would've breached the landship a hundred times over by now!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: ...Doctor, I believe Closure.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They must be using some other method then.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss Amiya, we're a stone's throw from the rendezvous point!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: As long as we link up with Team 6, we can get in contact with the subterranean support unit. Once we're underground, the Sarkaz pursuing us will be out of luck.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: No, don't go that way.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Huh? Why... wait, what? Miss Siege, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Weren't you under...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Team 6 is...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Team 6 is what? Why do you look so... erk, Miss Indra, have you seen all that blood on your hands?!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Your soldiers, they... all gave their lives.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Th-That can't be right! Team 6 is still ahead of us, how could they have run into the Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We don't have time to analyze how.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Doctor, it wasn't the Sarkaz force pursuing us that killed Team 6's soldiers.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The enemy they faced had terrifying Originium Arts... It was more of a massacre than a battle. Hardly any of them had even drawn their weapons.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You sure it was Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I don't believe that!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: I saw this red bug thing tear the soldiers' chests apart. Vina, you saw it too! That was a genuine monster!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: ...So the perpetrator is no ordinary Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have to change course. Mr. Feist, are there any other routes we can take?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes. But we don't have any support waiting on it. If we run into Sarkaz forces...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We'll be in for another hard fight.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Find cover!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn, what the hell is this?!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: What did that Sarkaz throw at us, a bomb? None of us even saw it—
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: ...Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Eyes up!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I... I just saw something red flash by in midair!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Retreat!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's like a thunderbolt or something! That's Originium Arts?!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: These... abominable devils!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Still won't come out?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Your war, your battle, your fight, it can't be this game of runabout you're playing, can it White Wolf?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Five aerial blood streaks at once?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Horn, we have no chance of—
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No matter how strong the Arts... he's only one person.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: What did Victoria do in the past, to prevail over the Sarkaz again and again?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: How many bolts do we have left?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Cover me.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: A pitiful act of defiance—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Now... is our chance.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Counting on an Arts bombardment to make your escape?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I'll give you a rude awakening.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: What I said still stands. So long as my soldiers remain here, I will not flee.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Not bad after all, White Wolf. I see you have the bravado to reverse course and charge me.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Such a shame then...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ––Rrgh!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Whoever told you that a Sarkaz depends solely on Arts in a fight?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Even wielding no more than a sword—I can still defeat every last one of you.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Beating me... may not be so difficult...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But making me fall will... not be so easy.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: How very brave of you.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It's thanks to that valor of yours that I can end this battle that much quicker—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The instant he thrusts his sword out, the soldier before Manfred abruptly vanishes.
She seems to practically dissolve and melt through the wall behind her, leaving not even a ripple.
These Arts are unfamiliar...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Vigilance!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ...A dagger from thin air?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: No, not from thin air...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You react very fast.
I'm afraid I'd have one more hole in my chest otherwise.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Target found! Take aim!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What the hell? They vanished again?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Th-They're too fast! I can't land a shot!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Shields up, up! Quick! Shit, are they able to blink?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Blink? No such Arts could be cast without leaving even a trace!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Or is this... a diversion?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Don't let them fool you! All men, cast precision aside! Attack at once!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: So long as the enemy is still in front of us, they have no escape!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Have we... hit them?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General, there's no body.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: But the ground is shot to hell... Where can they still be hiding?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: General, behind you!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Show yourself, and your life is mine!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Really?
Manfred, you put it very well, but unfortunately... you were only half right.
Half?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Sarkaz do not depend solely on Arts to fight—
—but in no world do Sarkaz wield swords alone.
Aarrghh!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The ground shouldn't be this soft—this place is going to swallow us! I-I'm losing my grip on my blade!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: General, you're sinking too?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...Nobody move, and nobody panic.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The dagger is his staff. These are Arts, and nothing more than Arts.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're very calm-headed. Good... you've saved your men's lives.
However...
Rgh!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The ground's... nearing my stomach...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: My sword...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: With your swordsmanship, blocking my attacks would be a simple task.
But the more you struggle, the quicker the ground swallows you.
Is this how you want to go... this self-destruction?
Urgh... *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: No one come near!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Or, you could cease all movements, same as your men.
You want me to wait as you run my heart through?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It'd be tough, killing you.
*cough* *cough*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I see now. You're not actually here to take my life.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I never imagined that outside of Ascalon, Rhodes Island would have yet another apex Sarkaz assassin.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I'm no assassin.
Unless it's called for, I have zero desire to harm any Sarkaz at all.
But here you are, abetting our enemies!
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Are these Victorians... your enemies?
What I see is a group of bruised, weary warriors, on the soil of their own home, struggling painfully just to live.
You and Theresis, on the other hand, are turning the Sarkaz into the enemy of all.
I had entertained having a talk with your people, if I had the chance.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It's a sorry thing, that we should first meet on the battlefield—
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: —Rhodes Island Elite Operator.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: He's gone again? Ngh—the ground's back to normal!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: A hair's breadth.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I was on the cusp of capturing him. His Arts are all too exceptional... He can induce hallucinations without influencing our nervous systems.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: There are marks of energy transformation on the ground. Could it be...?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General, they're all gone! Those Victoria soldiers, I mean—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Keh... He would visit me and stall for time, just to extricate those half-dead soldiers one by one?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Are... Are we pursuing them, then?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Do you think we can?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I may have called it a hair's breadth, but against a Caster of that level, a hair's breadth is tantamount to guaranteed failure.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Dammit! We were set to clean out all the rebel forces by today! Now a mercenary's gone traitor AND some mystery Caster's held us back!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It's Rhodes Island... This is all because of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We missed our chance to round them up in their entirety, but their losses can't be light, can they?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: They had their chance to hide in the dark, but now they've been driven front and center. For them, revealing their forces is already a colossal tactical defeat.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: An assassin, an expert spacial illusionist Caster, and the as-yet unseen Banshee... How many cards does Rhodes Island still have up their sleeve?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General, what are your plans?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...Let us go. Before we deal with Rhodes Island, we first need to put the discontented clown in its place.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: This should be far enough for now.
...Is this outside of the factory district?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You... cut open space with your dagger?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Don't always trust your senses. Tricking your eyes is much easier than influencing space.
You've...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You've rescued me, and not just once. My eyes might not show me the truest answers, but my senses never lie.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Just who are you?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Misery. I'm Misery of Rhodes Island.
Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You'll get a chance to hear a full explanation from Bagpipe in due time.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Bagpipe?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: She's a coworker at this point.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Not to mention... the last friend my best friend ever made.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Sounds like I've been quite a bit out of the loop.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: But before I lose myself to the joy that Bagpipe made it out, allow me to once again thank you and Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Let's get out of here first. Chances are we'll be meeting again soon enough.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Manfred's almost worked out the truth of my Originium Arts. He could be coming after us any moment now.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: ...No. I imagine he'll be busy with something else right now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You mean Dublinn.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: County Hillock's Mandragora... There's no way she's leaving this factory now.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Are you giving yourself grief for not being able to personally avenge your comrades?
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: I... I'm just lamenting.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Myself for standing here, regretting that I missed the opportunity to kill her...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Or her, for being long since beyond saving.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: That's odd. This is what you agreed with them, right? Why aren't they here to back us up?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I—argh!
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: What the hell is it—?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Sarkaz! It's Sarkaz! We have to run—
attributes.name: Dublinn Soldier

attributes.content: ...Were we spotted?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: No. Not like this. 'Spy', we have to go—
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Only ten meters to that sliding door there, right? Just ten meters, and we're right out, and...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: A... Alright, let's run...
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: Just like we used to, you pulling me. We only had to run fast enough that those noble kids couldn't catch us...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Grotesques! Get down, block them!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Bastards! Can't even rely on you in a time like this?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Mandragora...
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: What? Didn't I tell you to stay quiet for now?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I can't keep walking. You go.
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: What...? Can't you see? I've been doing all this just to...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: To save me? Or to gain favor with the Leader?
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: Is there a difference? What are you talking about? We're just five meters away, our people are right outside!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: They're gone.
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Mandragora... The Leader... she's long since abandoned us...
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: 'Spy'!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Bastard, bastard—stones, go! Skewer them, impale every one of those Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: You'll be alright, 'Spy', it's just an arrow, we're three meters away, even if I have to carry you—
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: ...Just go.
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: If you can make it out...
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: Don't... Don't head for the Leader.
attributes.name: Taran Secret Agent

attributes.content: ...Did you just die?
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Who said you could die so easily...? I...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Cillian, Cillian... you bloody disgrace! I'm not letting you die here, you stand up for me, stand up!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: No need to work yourself up.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You won't live much longer either, Mandragora. You and your old Taran friend will meet again before you know it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Ha... hahahaha!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Manfred, you cost me another eleven lives.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: You don't know the half... you don't know anything of what it took to kill that many Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: ...This is exactly why you must die here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Perfect... drop yourselves right in my lap.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: I'll crush every one of you into paste, no prisoners.
attributes.name: Mandragora
